title: Wireless Noise-Cancelling Headphones
summary: Experience premium sound quality and total comfort with these wireless noise-cancelling headphones. Perfect for travel, work, and everyday use.

features.title: Active Noise Cancellation
content: Blocks out unwanted background noise for an immersive sound experience.

features.title: Long Battery Life
content: Up to 30 hours of continuous playtime on a single charge.

features.title: Comfortable Fit
content: Soft ear cushions and adjustable headband for all-day comfort.
